question: Which country's most prominent medieval chronicler is "Ari Thorgilsson"?
explanation: Iceland's most prominent medieval chronicler is "Ari Thorgilsson". Ari Thorgilsson was Iceland's most prominent medieval chronicler. He is the author of Islendingabok, which details the histories of the various families who settled in Iceland. He is typically referred to as Ari the Wise and according to Snorri Sturluson was the first to write history in Old Norse.
